name: Sight Word Adventures - An Educative Quickstart For Children
blurb: Video Game - A stand alone tool to accompany teachers and parents in assisting young students with learning Dr. Fry's Sight Words.

rewards.reward: Our undying appreciation, friendship, and recognition in the credits. Seriously, thank you. This is our dream, and everything helps.

This is where the fun starts. This reward value is the baseline game. You will receive access to an online source, as well as access to a download for either an ipad app, or desktop app for the full length, stand alone game.
